name: Hexagon Knockout
description:
Enter the arena and be the last survivor! Your vehicle is equipped with a rocket launcher placed at the rear of your car. To win against your opponents, you will have to dodge, drift, and shoot at the right time: be careful not to fall!


In order to achieve victory, it will be necessary to triumph 5 times against the other players. If you fall, you won't respawn until the next round so be careful of your surroundings. The ground gradually crumbles as time goes by, and there won't be much room for the last survivors.


The main mechanic of the game is to fire a rocket from the back of your car. This can be used in different situations to your advantage:
  • Hit a player with the rocket to knock him out
  • The rocket gives you a speed boost allowing you to dodge
  • This same bonus allows you to bump other vehicles to push them
  • If you are about to die, you can try to get back on the ground if you shoot at the right time


Each round, a new game mode is applied to the game. You will come across 12 alternative ruleset:
  • Classic
  • Keep the Crown
  • Donut
  • Bumpers
  • Huge Cars
  • Tic Tac Boom
  • Rocket Rain
  • Tokyo Drift
  • Sniper
  • Fast Shoot
  • Gotta Go Fast
  • Kamikaze
It's up to you to discover their effects with your friends!
